price:
106. Badankoodna ma rumeeyaan Alle 
 iyagoo wax la wadaajinaya (cibaadada) maahee oo u shariig yeelaya.
arabic: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illā wahum mush'rikūna
